"What the? I need to fart! Let me fart, Damnit!" He yelled, grunting as hard as he could, straining until his face went red, but once again, nothing.
Shiron was starting to panic, and didn't notice st first as his stomach started to bloat outwards with the growing amount of gas he desperately wanted to release. He tried again and again, even trying to get himself to belch, but it was no use. He took a few steps, and noticed his stomach. It was bloated at least three times its normal size, and still growing. He sniffed it, and nearly puked at the sulphuric stench his stomach was giving off.
His eyes widened.
"No," he said quietly, "No it can't be! W-what is this magic?!"

152.content:
Greetings fellow reader my name is Carlos Corgi and this is my story.

The place: Acme Acres.

The year: 1990.

The show: Tiny Toon Adventures.

The episode: You asked for it.

The story: It all began way back in 1990 as yours truly Carlos Corgi an anthropomorphic Pembroke Welsh corgi dog appeared on Tiny Toon Adventures.

You see I didn't know it, but before the episode's 3rd and final segment aired the show's main characters Buster and Babs Bunny made some adjustments to Plucky's machine as the last segment wouldn't have Plucky Duck as that segment's main star but in this case someone else would be that 3rd and final segment's star.

After the commercial break a title card appeared on screen that read Dog in luck as Plucky's machine picked yours truly as the star of the 3rd and final segment as I was completely surprised and looked at the camera as I spoke to the audience.

"Well what you do know? I guess I'm going to star in this segment, and of course I'm going to let the viewers decide on what will happen to me." I said as I addressed the audience and viewers.

Before I knew it I was seated at a picnic table as a mysterious looking beverage known as Nature's Goodness a giant donut that had highly radioactive frosting on it and a plate full of super sushi happened to be right in front of me as there was also a note that mentioned I had to either drink this mysterious looking beverage as it will transform me into a huge heavy handsome bloated monster version of myself, eat this giant donut which transform me into a giant slime monster version of myself or eat a plate full of super sushi which will transform me into a giant sized superhero version of myself known as Super Corgi.

At that moment I decided to.....

"I have decided to eat this giant doughnut with highly radioactive frosting as it will transform me into a gigantic fat anthropomorphic slime monster version of myself." I said as I kindly addressed the audience that was watching.

Without wasting any second longer I swallowed the giant doughnut whole as I was now round and not so wobbly looking.

At that moment I was now standing on the outskirts of Acme Acres as I transformed into that of a gigantic fat animated anthropomorphic slime monster known as Yucky Dog as I addressed the audience once again as I looked right at the camera.

"Now that I've transformed into a gigantic fat animated anthropomorphic slime monster known as Yucky Dog I'm going to let the audience pick one of two choices." I said as I addressed the audience that was watching as I presented both choices to the audience that was watching.

Choice #1 Yucky Dog defends Acme Acres: I Yucky Dog will defend my hometown of Acme Acres from any evil giant monster that's going to destroy Acme Acres as you the audience can also choose whether I will take on my opponent alone or if a good giant monster will team up with yours truly to save Acme Acres.

Choice #2 Yucky Dog eats Acme Acres: I Yucky Dog will eat all of Acme Acres along with anyone and anything that will stand in my path.


"You may now make your decision." I said as I addressed the audience that was watching.
